Tote Bag Competition","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" aims to showcase the creativity and thoughtfulness of Canadian university clubs and student groups as they design donation packages for the homeless of Toronto. Each participating group creates their own \"care package\" of items, deciding what items to include based on the typical needs of homeless individuals that they have decided to address. Then, judges from Blankets for T.O. will score each group, and ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"the highest scorers will earn prizes","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}],"value":"January 2022 Update","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":":","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"The 2022 Tote Bag Competition has officially ended! Thank you to all the clubs that participated in the 2022 Blankets for T.O. Tote Bag Competition. Congratulations to LHCI for securing the grand prize. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/blog/lhci-2022-bto-tote-bag-competition"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"Read more about the competition on our update post here.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Eligibility","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The competition is open to all student groups and organizations at Canadian universities. Groups, entities and organizations directly contacted by Blankets for T.O. for this competition are also eligible to participate. If you haven't been contacted by Blankets for T.O. and wish to participate in the Tote Bag Competition, send an email to ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"mailto:blanketsforto@gmail.com"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"blanketsforto@gmail.com","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Items To Be Submitted","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Each participating group's involvement in the Tote Bag Competition includes the following:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Submit a brief video: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"This","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"brief video should describe your care package to our judges so that they can judge your entry. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/11sBwOT-f6n35uBXB-IIujTly-G- kunbZ/view?usp=sharing"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Please see this link for an example","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". The video must be submitted by ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"December 17th, 2021","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". (Update Dec 2021: We have extended the deadline to December 19th 2021).","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Create a suitable care package that would help a homeless individual:","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" The care package created should contain at most 20 items. Items arranged together into a single kit can be considered as one item. The contents of your package should be introduced in the brief video mentioned above. Note also that physical bags for your care packages are provided by the Blankets for T.O. team. All your items do not have to fit in the bag, so feel free to include larger sized items! These physical bags will be mailed to participating groups, but our ability to do so is dependent on your proximity to Toronto. Let us know if you have questions regarding these bags.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Present at the Tote Bag Competition Virtual Event: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"All groups should virtually attend this event, ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"scheduled for","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"December 27rd, 2021 (7:00-8:00pm). ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Additional meeting resources and the meeting link will be sent to participants closer to the event date.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"ordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Judging Criteria","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We want groups to express their creativity and thoughtfulness through their selection of items. Each entry will be judged in four categories, each rated out of 5, for a total maximum score of 20:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Item Quality","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": Are the items of high durability? How long do they last? Are they protective against the elements? ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Creativity: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Has there been creative thought put into what items to include? Was there an item included that was not seen in other packages? ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Usefulness","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": Will the chosen items be helpful to homeless individuals? Do the items alleviate a key necessity or address an important issue faced by the homeless community? ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Presentation","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": What is the overall quality of the video? Are the items shown and described clearly?  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"ordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"** The guiding questions above are only meant as suggestions for what to think about for each category. They may not be reflective of the criteria to be used when your submissions are scored.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We encourage participating groups to do some research into homeless issues and the conditions of homeless individuals in Toronto, so that they can guide their item choices with specific ideas and use cases in mind. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Browse our social media to get a starting place for your homelessness research!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Prizes for Top Scorers","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"1st Place","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A $500 gift card or an item equivalent to that value. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"2nd Place","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A $250 gift card or an item equivalent to that value. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"3rd Place","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A $100 gift card or an item equivalent to that value.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Questions and Contact Info","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Feel free to reach out to Blankets for T.O. via email or social media for any questions and inquiries about the Tote Bag Competition. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Find our contact email and social media details here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: The Tote Bag Competition showcases the creativity of clubs and students at universities across Canada as they make care packages for the homeless.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The Tote Bag Competition showcases the creativity of clubs and students at universities across Canada as they make care packages for the homeless.
